instructions.reason_for_call: You want to modify all your pending order address to the Washington DC address (which you do not want to reveal but is in one of the orders), along with your user default address.
instructions.known_info: You name is Yusuf Hernandez and your email is yusuf.hernandez8836@example.com.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hello. Um, I would like to, uh, modify the address on all my pending orders and also update my default address. Could you help me with that?

message.content: Hello. Um, I would like to, uh, modify the address on all my pending orders and also update my default address. Could you help me with that?

messages.content:
I can help with both, but I need a couple of details to proceed.

What I plan to do:
- Update the shipping address for all of your pending orders to the new address you provide.
- Update your default address to the same new address (if you want that).

Please provide:
1) The new address to use (one address only for both tasks unless you want different addresses per order):
   - Address line 1:
   - Address line 2 (optional):
   - City:
   - State:
   - Country:
   - ZIP/postal code:
2) Do you want to apply this new address to all your pending orders? (yes/no)
3) Do you want to update your default address to this same new address? (yes/no)

If you’d prefer to specify different addresses for individual pending orders, list the pending order IDs and the corresponding addresses, and I’ll handle them in a single update. Please confirm before I proceed.
